com.asm.text

Class PositionData

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.asm.text.PositionData
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.os.Parcelable

    public class PositionData
extends java.lang.Object
implements android.os.Parcelable
    Position data when returns to getPositionData. It marks position, lines, cols, x position, and y position.
